name: The Village (itch) (thatgamesclub, Sindi Breshani, Juliette)
description:
The Village is an open world story , that invites visitors into six houses in order to discover the history of extraordinary characters and interwoven destinies, revealing a tale of a surreal society and a haunting curse. Designed by MA students from the Royal College of Art as a part of UCL’s Playing the Archive project, The Village experience is a powerful story made in collaboration with ten children, which looks at their perception of today's current affairs, our relationship with the universe, and living life to the fullest.

Its original soundtrack can be found here: 
The Village (Original Soundtrack) by Dimitris Menex

And this is how we created it: 
The Village: A VR village built by kids
